bill.title: Controlled projects. Provides that the term "controlled project" in the statute applicable to the issuing of bonds and other evidences of indebtedness by political subdivisions does not include: (1) an infrastructure project; or (2) a project for the construction of a data center. Increases from $25,000,000 to $50,000,000 the aggregate limit of costs of controlled projects for any 365 day period above which a political subdivision is required to conduct a referendum for additional proposed controlled projects.
